1128790.name: Elsinore - Soundtrack
1128790.description:
Includes the Elsinore soundtrack in MP3 format, composed by Adam Gubman. This soundtrack contains all music from Elsinore, plus additional tracks and B-sides not heard in the original game.

Track Listing


01 - Ophelia
02 - Pakke Mit Hjerte
03 - The Greens
04 - Ghosts
05 - Unwritten
06 - Watchman To My Heart
07 - Festival
08 - A Mark, A Hole, A Hand, A Heart, A Scar
09 - No Love is Lost Love
10 - Courtroom Politics
11 - Quince
12 - Hide The Slain
13 - So Sweet Breath
14 - Fair As a Rose
15 - Twisting, Turning
16 - Will He Not Come Again
17 - Cold, Calculated, Clever
18 - Wider Oceans Have Been Swam
19 - Falling Into Madness
20 - Donne The Boat Boy
21 - Slow Cut
22 - My Memory Lock'd
23 - The Fates Sing to Ophelia
24 - To Murder, Or Not To Murder
25 - Ophelia's Music Box - Wider Oceans
26 - Only Love
